title: Champs with excessive mobility that works for both offense and escapes

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=RÃ²ssy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=PcF4RfEB,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-06T19:01:35.614+0000)

> 
> 
> You forgot these.

Olaf R can't be used for escape, he only gets MS when running towards enemy champions.
Aatrox Q is a no.
Vi Q needs to be charged, so not a good escape.
Wu's escape is not mobility, unless you're talking about his ult.
Zac's escape needs to be charged.

Olaf R can be used to escape, increased movement speed + no disable means walk away quickly.

Vi Q has a decen't distance from instant cast.

Wu has a clone and the enemies have to guess which way he went as he is invisible

Zac takes no time to charge and his instant cast gives gives some range.


What you seem to don't understand is that im mocking the guy saying anychamp with a dash can be used to engage or escape, but i forgot riot boards lack common sense.
Not sure why you picked zed when his escape has a 22 second cooldown
